APILanguage 
 public APILanguage()

TtaNewLanguage 
 public static native char TtaNewLanguage(String languageName,
                                          char languageAlphabet,
                                          String principalDictionary,
                                          String secondDictionary)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaNewLanguage Not available for TYPO languages. Declares a new language, its alphabet and optionally the names of the principal ans secondary dictionaries. All languages used in a Thot document must be explicitely declared, except for predefined languages. Thot registers all declared languages and allocates a different identifier to each of them. This function does not load dictionaries but loads their name. If principalDictionary and/or secondDictionary are not NULL values, dictionaries are loaded when necessary from files $DICOPAR/principalDictionary and/or $DICOPAR/secondDictionary. If an application redeclares an existing language, this new declaration has no effect. Parameters: languageName: name of the language according RFC 1766. languageAlphabet: alphabet to be used for writing that language: `L' for ISO-Latin-1, `G' for Symbol (Greek). principalDictionary: name of the principal dictionary or NULL. secondDictionary: name of the secondary dictionary or NULL. Return value: identifier of the new language or 0 if the language cannot be added. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaRemoveLanguage 
 public static native void TtaRemoveLanguage(char language)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaRemoveLanguage Remove a language from the Thot language table. Parameters: language: the language to be removed. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetLanguageIdFromName 
 public static native char TtaGetLanguageIdFromName(String languageName)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetLanguageIdFromName Available for TYPO languages. Returns the identifier of a language that matches a language name. Parameters: languageName: name of the language. Return value: identifier of that language or 0 if the language is unknown. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetVarLANG 
 public static native String TtaGetVarLANG()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetVarLANG Returns the 2 first chars of environment variable LANG or 'fr'. Return value: a string of 2 chars. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetDefaultLanguage 
 public static native char TtaGetDefaultLanguage()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetDefaultLanguage Returns the identifier of the default language. Return value: identifier of the default language. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetLanguageIdFromAlphabet 
 public static native char TtaGetLanguageIdFromAlphabet(char languageAlphabet)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetLanguageIdFromAlphabet Not available for TYPO languages. Returns the identifier of the first language that uses a given alphabet. Parameters: languageAlphabet: the alphabet of interest (`L' = latin, `G' = greek). Return value: identifier of that language or 0 if the language is unknown. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetAlphabet 
 public static native char TtaGetAlphabet(char languageId)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetAlphabet Not available for TYPO languages. Returns the alphabet of a language. Parameters: languageId: name of the language. Return value: a character that identifies the alphabet ('L' = latin, 'G' = greek). ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetLanguageName 
 public static native String TtaGetLanguageName(char languageId)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetLanguageName Not available for TYPO languages. Returns the name of a given language. Parameters: languageId: identifier of the language. Return value: the name of the language. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetLanguageCode 
 public static native String TtaGetLanguageCode(char languageId)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetLanguageCode Not available for TYPO languages. Returns the RFC-1766 code of a given language. Parameters: languageId: identifier of the language. Return value: the code of the language. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetNumberOfLanguages 
 public static native int TtaGetNumberOfLanguages()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetNumberOfLanguages Not available for TYPO languages. Returns the current number of languages known by Thot. Return value: the current number of languages. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaLoadLanguageDictionaries 
 public static native boolean TtaLoadLanguageDictionaries(char languageId)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaLoadLanguageDictionaries Loads the dictionary associated with a language, if it is not loaded yet and registers that a dictionary associated with this language has been loaded. Returns -1 if the mandatory dictionary cann't be loaded. 0 if no dictionary has been loaded 1 if the mandatory dictionary is loaded. Parameters: languageId: name of the concerned language. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaUnLoadLanguageDictionaries 
 public static native void TtaUnLoadLanguageDictionaries(char languageId)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaUnLoadLanguageDictionaries Unloads dictionaries associated with a given language. Parameters: languageId: identifier of the language. ----------------------------------------------------------------------
